column5: This intensive course is for people who want to use high-level project management skills to make a difference to the performance of global businesses.All of your teaching will reflect the kind of tasks and challenges you may be likely to face in the professional environment.Study with us for a master’s degree in International Project Management and you will have the opportunity to learn the latest, most relevant techniques, and best practice. The course aims to prepare you to sit for a range of professional qualifications including PRINCE2, PMP, SCRUM and APM upon graduation.
column9: 1 year full time, 18 months extended professional practice
